sections.title: State-specific context
paragraphs: Santa Catarina has a distinct economic and administrative profile. Most immigration registrations occur in Florianópolis, and access can vary by city.

sections.title: Document checklist
paragraphs: Gather the essentials now to speed up your application.
Valid passport and recent photos
Proof of address and civil status documents
Background checks (local and federal if required)
Proof of income, employment, or sponsorship
Translations and notarizations where applicable
